title: Definitely not Darius!
body:
**Skin suggestion**:
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2FRvPLjKC.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

This skin would be hilirious if it was in game!

His lines could be like:

_"Fear not, I'm.. uh, on my way!"_

_"For Noxia! I mean, for Demoxus! Wait that's not right either..."_

_"Come forth, you will find death in honor, or is it the other way around?"_

_"To the Fields of... what are we fighting for again?"_

_"They will regret opposing me, i garen-tee it"_

replies.body:
This needs to be in game, 100% would buy and 100% would forget i even bought Dunkmaster.
